metadata.title: CVE-2015-1802 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The bdfReadProperties function in bitmap/bdfread.c in X.Org libXfont before1.4.9 and 1.5.x before 1.5.1 allows remote authenticated users to cause adenial of service (out-of-bounds write and crash) or possibly executearbitrary code via a (1) negative or (2) large property count in a BDF fontfile.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1802` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxfont1 - 1:1.4.7-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxfont package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.4.7-1ubuntu0.2').
